text:
In my free time, I like to play squash and badminton and to perform culinary experiments. Thanks to Michael Tao, I also know some lifting.
I'm perenially trying to be better at sketching. Some of my sketches can be found here. Please note that a few depict naked figure drawings and may be considered NSFW in some cultures.
I'm fluent in Hindi and English, and am trying (not hard enough) to improve my French and Punjabi.
